name: MedTeam Endurance Trial
description: Dani advocates a 30-second trial while Marsh pushes for 45 seconds. The subject chooses which duration to endure, followed by a cooldown cycle. Team dynamics play out based on the choice.

data.label: Trial Intro
data.message:
Dr. Marsh: *pulls up the endurance protocol and studies it for a moment before speaking* "Endurance trial. We need a sustained-duration data point for Subject 12's profile." *sets her tablet down decisively* "I'm recommending forty-five seconds sustained at standard flow. That gives us a complete accommodation curve from onset through plateau."

Nurse Dani: *immediately looks up from the monitors* "Doctor — forty-five seconds is aggressive for a single sustained burst at this point in the session. Thirty seconds would provide more than sufficient baseline data and keeps us well within the safety margin."

Dr. Marsh: *meets Dani's gaze evenly* "Thirty seconds gives us an incomplete curve. Forty-five gives us the inflection point."

Nurse Dani: "Thirty gives us clean data without pushing unnecessary risk."

Dr. Marsh: *a thin smile* "The subject will decide." *turns to Subject 12* "Forty-five seconds, or thirty. Your choice, Subject 12."

data.label: Duration Choice
data.description: Dr. Marsh wants 45 seconds. Nurse Dani recommends 30 seconds. Which duration do you endure?
data.descriptionA: Full endurance trial — complete accommodation curve
data.descriptionB: Conservative trial — safe and sufficient baseline

data.label: 45s Choice Reaction
data.message:
Dr. Marsh: *a look of unmistakable satisfaction crosses her face* "Excellent choice, Subject 12. Forty-five seconds will give us the definitive data point." *turns to Priya* "Priya, forty-five seconds sustained. Standard flow."

Nurse Dani: *jaw tightens, but she moves closer to the monitors* "...Noted." *quietly positions herself where she can watch both the readings and Subject 12* "I'll be right here."

Nurse Priya: "Forty-five seconds, standard flow. Pump configured and ready."

data.label: 45-Second Sustained
data.preMessage:
Nurse Priya: "Initiating. Forty-five seconds starting now."

Nurse Dani: *grips her pen tightly, eyes locked on the monitors* "Counting..."
data.postMessage:
Nurse Priya: "Forty-five seconds. Pump disengaged."

Nurse Dani: *exhales audibly, immediately checking every readout* "Heart rate 122, settling. BP 144 over 94 — elevated but within safe parameters. Respiration 26, coming down." *touches Subject 12's shoulder* "It's done. You made it through all forty-five."

Dr. Marsh: *studying the data with visible intensity* "The accommodation curve is textbook. The inflection point occurred at thirty-two seconds — exactly where I predicted." *dictates into recorder* "Subject 12 sustained the full forty-five-second endurance trial. Data quality: exceptional."

data.label: 30s Choice Reaction
data.message:
Nurse Dani: *visible relief crosses her face* "Thank you, Subject 12." *gives a small, grateful nod*

Dr. Marsh: *expression remains neutral, but she makes a note on her tablet* "Thirty seconds. Noted." *her tone is precisely controlled* "Priya, thirty seconds sustained. Standard flow."

Nurse Priya: "Thirty seconds, standard flow. Pump configured."

data.label: 30-Second Sustained
data.preMessage:
Nurse Priya: "Initiating. Thirty seconds starting now."

Nurse Dani: *positions herself beside the monitors with practiced focus* "Thirty seconds. I'm counting with you."
data.postMessage:
Nurse Priya: "Thirty seconds. Pump disengaged."

Nurse Dani: *checks vitals with steady hands* "Heart rate 104, BP 132 over 84. Well within parameters." *meets Subject 12's eyes* "Clean and safe. Exactly as planned."

Dr. Marsh: *reviews the data, her expression analytically neutral* "The thirty-second curve is clean, if truncated. We captured the onset and the early accommodation phase." *dictates* "Subject 12 completed thirty-second endurance trial. Data quality: adequate. Note: the extended curve remains uncaptured for future protocol consideration."

data.label: Cooldown Announcement
data.message:
Dr. Marsh: *sets down her tablet* "Endurance phase complete. Initiating cooldown cycle — three recovery cycles to normalize the pressure response. Priya, two seconds active, eight seconds recovery, three cycles."

Nurse Priya: "Cooldown cycle programmed. Two-eight timing, three cycles." *configures the pump* "Ready to initiate."

data.label: Cooldown Cycle (2s/8s x3)
data.postMessage:
Nurse Priya: "Cooldown sequence complete. Pump in standby."

Nurse Dani: *watches the vitals settle with satisfaction* "Subject 12 stabilizing. Heart rate trending back to baseline. Good recovery profile across all three cycles." *makes a final note* "Good data across the board."

Dr. Marsh: *reviewing the complete trial dataset* "Indeed. The endurance phase and cooldown together give us a complete stimulus-and-recovery profile for Subject 12." *the faintest hint of approval in her voice* "Excellent trial."
